data.md:MetaData: Age determination of sediment core BALLYGIS, Ballygisheen Bog, Ireland

Blanket bog. Physiography: Reeks mountain range. Surrounding vegetation: Calluna, Erica tetralix and Sphagnum. Local vegetation: Racomitrium, Sphagnum, Drosera, Menyanthes. Location: in the raised bog
Multi-proxy Evidence from bogs for environmental change in Ireland over the last 1,200 years
